JASYPT: Java Simplified Encryption 1.5 API

This document is the API specification for the Jasypt Java Simplified Encryption library, version 1.5.

This document is the API specification for the Jasypt Java Simplified Encryption library, version 1.5.

Direct links to the most popular classes:

  • Easy encryption entities:
    • BinaryEncryptor
    • Digester
    • DecimalNumberEncryptor
    • IntegerNumberEncryptor
    • PasswordEncryptor
    • TextEncryptor
  • Message digesting:
    • StandardByteDigester
    • StandardStringDigester
  • Message encrypting:
    • StandardPBEByteEncryptor
    • StandardPBEStringEncryptor
    • StandardPBEBigIntegerEncryptor
    • StandardPBEBigDecimalEncryptor
  • Hibernate transparent encryption:
    • HibernatePBEEncryptorRegistry
    • HibernatePBEByteEncryptor
    • HibernatePBEStringEncryptor
    • HibernatePBEBigIntegerEncryptor
    • HibernatePBEBigDecimalEncryptor
  • Spring Security (ACEGI Security) integration:
    • org.jasypt.springsecurity.PasswordEncoder
    • org.jasypt.springsecurity.PBEPasswordEncoder
  • Salt generation:
    • SaltGenerator
    • RandomSaltGenerator
    • FixedByteArraySaltGenerator
    • FixedStringSaltGenerator
